alert.note: Alert for Brooke; Marshall; Ohio; Wetzel (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 03 at 11:22AM EST by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...A LINE OF SHOWERS WILL AFFECT MONROE...SOUTHEASTERN NOBLE... SOUTHEASTERN JEFFERSON...EASTERN BELMONT...EASTERN BEAVER...CENTRAL VENANGO...BUTLER...ALLEGHENY...NORTHWESTERN JEFFERSON...WESTERN GREENE...ARMSTRONG...CLARION...FOREST...WASHINGTON...NORTHWESTERN WESTMORELAND...OHIO...WETZEL...MARSHALL AND BROOKE COUNTIES... At 1119 AM EST, radar indicated showers were located along a cold front extending from 6 miles north of Oil City to 7 miles south of Shippingport to 10 miles north of Marietta. Movement was east at 45 mph. Wind gusts up to 50 mph are possible with these showers. These gusts will last for less than an hour, and will be followed by gusts of 25 to 35 MPH into the afternoon. Locations impacted include... Pittsburgh, Penn Hills, Mount Lebanon, Bethel Park, Ross Township, Wheeling, McCandless Township, Monroeville, Cranberry, Moon Township, McMurray, and Weirton. If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Use extra caution if traveling, especially in high-profile vehicles.
